lours eery truly,

Bill Dunlap
Program Director, KMDW
Ho. 15 - WILL
"MASS Radio Network Manager, John Holt, was asking ms about tbs aeries of
programs, Letter Proa Italy. Since he asked me, I'd like to put ay thoughts on
paper.
"1 believe the aeries is the type of program that we need more of on all
radio, and in particular on our educational stations. I think the series by
Graham Hovsy is typleally good of the kind that we ell should do more of on our
educational stations. I cannot help but feel that Graham Rovey ia a "doubly good"
product of a good idea. He's a good U.S.A. representative in Italy* he's doing
an especially good Job in creating a better understanding of Italy in the U.S.A.
"WILL has received a number of comments on the aeries of programs, according
to our mail count record, but m do not have them in file or I'd transmit copies
of some of them to you, along with ay remarks."
Sincerely yours,
/«/ Prank I. Sehooley
Frank B. Schoolsy, Director
University Broadcasting
No. 16 * WUOA
"Tour request concerning our reactions to "Letter from Italy" has been
referred to me for reply.
"We have not received direct comments on this series from our listeners.
They usually mention the type of program they enjoy rather than specific titles.
Our general schedule of international programs has received much favorable comment.
